Article
Full-text available

Article
Full-text available
  • Sep 2018
  • Chao Zhang
  • Jochen Martens
Lobonychiumpalpiplus Roewer, 1938, originally reported from Indonesian Borneo, is redescribed based on the specimens from Malaysia. The genus Uracrobates (Acari, Oribatida, Mochlozetidae)
Article
Full-text available
  • Jun 2015
  • Sergey G. Ermilov
  • Jochen Martens
Uracrobates (Parauracrobates) truncatus sp. nov. is proposed, based on specimens from soil in Nepal. Parauracrobates subgen. nov. is distinguishable from subgenus Uracrobates by the notogaster truncated posteriorly (versus conical). An identification key to known taxa in the genus Uracrobates is given.
